favourite.article: I didn't realize that the song I learned long time ago is actually a verse from the Bible: Ps 89:1.
God gave me this song today and I will sing of the mercies of The Lord forever! Praise Him and bless His holy name :)
Today, November 18, 2012 I have this song in my heart :) I am blessed with having various hymns in my heart, on different days. We serve an Awesome God!
There is no music mode accompanying the words of this song.
I have been singing the chorus of this song since childhood (a long time ago!) so I was particularly happy to see it now with a verse. Thanks.
